Naafiri.name: Naafiri
Naafiri.title: the Hound of a Hundred Bites
Naafiri.lore: Across the sands of Shurima, a chorus of howls rings out. It is the call of the dune hounds, voracious predators who form packs and compete for the right to hunt in these barren lands. Among them, one pack stands above all, for they are driven not only by canine instincts, but by the ancient power of the Darkin.
Naafiri.blurb: Across the sands of Shurima, a chorus of howls rings out. It is the call of the dune hounds, voracious predators who form packs and compete for the right to hunt in these barren lands. Among them, one pack stands above all, for they are driven not only...
allytips: Across the sands of Shurima, a chorus of howls rings out. It is the call of the dune hounds, voracious predators who form packs and compete for the right to hunt in these barren lands. Among them, one pack stands above all, for they are driven not only by canine instincts, but by the ancient power of the Darkin.

spells.name: Darkin Daggers
spells.description:
Naafiri hurls up to two daggers, each inflicting bleed, or each inflicting bonus damage if the target is already bleeding.

Packmates leap to attack champions hit by this skill.
spells.tooltip:
Naafiri hurls Darkin-tainted blades, dealing {{ spell.naafiriq:totaldamagefirstcast }} physical damage and inflicting a bleed, dealing {{ spell.naafiriq:totalbleeddamage }} physical damage over {{ spell.naafiriq:bleedduration }} seconds.

Naafiri can Recast this Ability. If enemies hit are already bleeding from this Ability, it instead deals the remaining bleed damage plus between {{ spell.naafiriq:totalmindamagesecondcast }} and {{ spell.naafiriq:totalmaxdamagesecondcast }} physical damage, based on their missing Health. If that target was a champion, Naafiri restores {{ spell.naafiriq:totalhealsecondcast }} Health.

Packmates will leap at the first champion hit and attack them for {{ spell.naafirip:packmatetauntduration }} seconds.

{{ spellmodifierdescriptionappend }}

spells.name: Hounds' Pursuit
spells.description: Naafiri and her packmates dash at an enemy, colliding with the first champion hit and dealing damage.
spells.tooltip:
Naafiri dashes at an enemy, stopping at the first champion she hits, dealing {{ totaldamage }} physical damage and briefly Slowing them.

Packmates become Untargetable and dash alongside Naafiri, dealing {{ packmatedamage }} physical damage per Packmate.

This Ability gains range based on Ultimate rank. Current Bonus: {{ spell.naafirir:wrangeincrease }}
{{ spellmodifierdescriptionappend }}

spells.name: Eviscerate
spells.description: Naafiri dashes and damages enemies in an area around her, recalling her packmates and fully healing them.
spells.tooltip:
Naafiri surges forward, dealing {{ totaldamagefirstslash }} physical damage, then explodes in a flurry of blades, dealing {{ totaldamagesecondslash }} physical damage.

Packmates are recalled to Naafiri and restore 100% Health.
{{ spellmodifierdescriptionappend }}

spells.name: The Call of the Pack
spells.description:
Naafiri empowers her pack and spawns additional packmates, instantly receiving a burst of speed and vision and gaining a shield the first time she hits another champion.

After killing another champion for the first time, all effects are refreshed.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Hounds' Pursuit gains {{ wrangeincrease }} range.

Active: Naafiri prepares to hunt, gaining {{ bonusad }} Attack Damage, empowering her pack, and spawning {{ packmatestoadd }} additional Packmates for {{ duration }} seconds.

Naafiri also gains vision of her surroundings and {{ movespeedooctootlip*100 }}% Decaying Move Speed for {{ movespeedduration }} seconds, reduced to {{ movespeedamount*100 }}% on taking damage. The first time she hits a champion, she gains {{ shieldtotal }} Shield for {{ shieldduration }} seconds.

On first champion takedown, all effects are refreshed.{{ spellmodifierdescriptionappend }}

passive.name: We Are More
passive.description: Naafiri spawns packmates that attack the targets of her attacks and abilities.
